attribute.name: selectedIndex
attribute.description: Index of tab that is selected by default.

attribute.name: activeTabStyleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the active tab cell.

attribute.name: inactiveTabStyleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the inactive tab cells.

attribute.name: disabledTabStyleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the disabled tab cells.

attribute.name: activeSubStyleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the active tab sub cell.

attribute.name: inactiveSubStyleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the inactive tab sub cells.

attribute.name: tabContentStyleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the active tab content cell.

attribute.name: activePanelTabVar
attribute.description: Boolean Variable that is set in request scope when rendering a panelTab. True means that the currently rendered panelTab is active.
